member.name: T:ApprovalTests.Asp.MovedToSeperateNugetPackage
member.summary: These classes have all been moved to a seperate Nuget Package. Simply add ApprovalTests.Asp

member.name: M:ApprovalTests.Core.IApprovalApprover.Approve
member.summary: Called to verify. Should save the received resource and compare.
member.remarks: Note: This is part 1 of a 2 part call : if (Approve()) {Fail()} To allow for the reporter to interject and approve in the interm
member.returns: true if Matching, false if not

member.name: M:ApprovalTests.Core.IApprovalApprover.Fail
member.summary: Called if Approve() returned false and the reporter did not Self-Approve via .ApprovedWhenReported() Usually throws an some sort of Exception
member.remarks: Note: This is part 1 of a 2 part call : if (Approve()) {Fail()} To allow for the reporter to interject and approve in the interm

member.name: M:ApprovalTests.Html.HtmlApprovals.VerifyHtmlStrict(System.String)
member.summary: Throws exception if Html is incorrectly formatted

member.name: M:ApprovalTests.Maintenance.ApprovalMaintenance.CleanUpAbandonedFiles
member.summary: ** Warning : use at your own risk ** Deletes any files that may have been abandoned.

member.name: M:ApprovalTests.Xml.XmlApprovals.VerifyXmlStrict(System.String)
member.summary: Throws exception if Xml is incorrectly formatted
